Continue.name: Continue
Continue.description: Only a part of the request has been received by the server, but as long as it has not been rejected, the client should continue with the request.

Created.name: Created
Created.description: The request is complete, and a new resource is created.

Accepted.name: Accepted
Accepted.description: The request is accepted for processing, but the processing is not complete.

Non-authoritative Information.name: Non-authoritative Information
Non-authoritative Information.description: The information in the entity header is from a local or third-party copy, not from the original server.

No Content.name: No Content
No Content.description: A status code and a header are given in the response, but there is no entity-body in the reply.

Reset Content.name: Reset Content
Reset Content.description: The browser should clear the form used for this transaction for additional input.

Partial Content.name: Partial Content
Partial Content.description: The server is returning partial data of the size requested. Used in response to a request specifying a Range header. The server must specify the range included in the response with the Content-Range header.

Multiple Choices.name: Multiple Choices
Multiple Choices.description: A link list. The user can select a link and go to that location. Maximum five addresses.

Moved Permanently.name: Moved Permanently
Moved Permanently.description: The requested page has moved to a new url.

Found.name: Found
Found.description: The requested page has moved temporarily to a new url.

See Other.name: See Other
See Other.description: The requested page can be found under a different url.

Not Modified.name: Not Modified
Not Modified.description: This is the response code to an If-Modified-Since or If-None-Match header, where the URL has not been modified since the specified date.

Use Proxy.name: Use Proxy
Use Proxy.description: The requested URL must be accessed through the proxy mentioned in the Location header.

Unused.name: Unused
Unused.description: This code was used in a previous version. It is no longer used, but the code is reserved.

Temporary Redirect.name: Temporary Redirect
Temporary Redirect.description: The requested page has moved temporarily to a new url.

Bad Request.name: Bad Request
Bad Request.description: The server did not understand the request.

Unauthorized.name: Unauthorized
Unauthorized.description: The requested page needs a username and a password.

Payment Required.name: Payment Required
Payment Required.description: You can not use this code yet.

Forbidden.name: Forbidden
Forbidden.description: Access is forbidden to the requested page.

Not Found.name: Not Found
Not Found.description: The server can not find the requested page.

Method Not Allowed.name: Method Not Allowed
Method Not Allowed.description: The method specified in the request is not allowed.

Not Acceptable.name: Not Acceptable
Not Acceptable.description: The server can only generate a response that is not accepted by the client.

Proxy Authentication Required.name: Proxy Authentication Required
Proxy Authentication Required.description: You must authenticate with a proxy server before this request can be served.

Request Timeout.name: Request Timeout
Request Timeout.description: The request took longer than the server was prepared to wait.

Conflict.name: Conflict
Conflict.description: The request could not be completed because of a conflict.

Gone.name: Gone
Gone.description: The requested page is no longer available.

Length Required.name: Length Required
Length Required.description: The "Content-Length" is not defined. The server will not accept the request without it.

Precondition Failed.name: Precondition Failed
Precondition Failed.description: The pre condition given in the request evaluated to false by the server.

Request Entity Too Large.name: Request Entity Too Large
Request Entity Too Large.description: The server will not accept the request, because the request entity is too large.

Request-url Too Long.name: Request-url Too Long
Request-url Too Long.description: The server will not accept the request, because the url is too long. Occurs when you convert a "post" request to a "get" request with a long query information.

Unsupported Media Type.name: Unsupported Media Type
Unsupported Media Type.description: The server will not accept the request, because the mediatype is not supported.

Requested Range Not Satisfiable.name: Requested Range Not Satisfiable
Requested Range Not Satisfiable.description: The requested byte range is not available and is out of bounds.

Expectation Failed.name: Expectation Failed
Expectation Failed.description: The expectation given in an Expect request-header field could not be met by this server.

Server Error.name: Server Error
Server Error.description: The request was not completed. The server met an unexpected condition.

Not Implemented.name: Not Implemented
Not Implemented.description: The request was not completed. The server did not support the functionality required.

Bad Gateway.name: Bad Gateway
Bad Gateway.description: The request was not completed. The server received an invalid response from the upstream server.

Service Unavailable.name: Service Unavailable
Service Unavailable.description: The request was not completed. The server is temporarily overloading or down.

HTTP Version Not Supported.name: HTTP Version Not Supported
HTTP Version Not Supported.description: The server does not support the "http protocol" version.
